Does Beijing mean "northern capital"?	yes
Does Beijing mean "northern capital"?	yes
Are the caves of Dragon Bone Hill near the village of Zhoukoudian in Fangshan District?	yes
Are hutongs disappearing?	yes
When did Beijing host the Olympic Games?	2008
When was the An Shi Rebellion launched?	in 755 AD
In 1949, where did Communist forces enter without a fight?	Beiping
When did Yuan Shikai die?	1916
Where does air pollution in Beijing come from?	surrounding cities and provinces
As of August 1st, 2006, how many trains stop daily at the Beijing Railway Station or the Beijing West Railway Station?	167
What is the name of a university (or similar institution for imparting higher education) in Beijing?	Tsinghua University
Are famous middle  schools  in Beijing :?	Yes
